alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 12:32AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Oxford, southern Androscoggin and northwestern Cumberland Counties through 115 AM EDT... At 1231 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Naples, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lewiston, Auburn, Bridgton, Mechanic Falls, Naples, Turner, Gray, Raymond, Lisbon, Casco, Harrison, Hebron, Poland, Minot, Otisfield, New Gloucester, Oxford, Sebago, and Sabattus. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 69 and 83. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Oxford
